verses.verse: Observe <WH8104> the month <WH2320> of Abib, <WH24> and keep <WH6213> the Passover <WH6453> to Yahweh <WH3068> your God; <WH430> for in the month <WH2320> of Abib <WH24> Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> brought you forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714> by night. <WH3915>

You shall sacrifice <WH2076> the Passover <WH6453> to Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> of the flock <WH6629> and the herd, <WH1241> in the place <WH4725> which Yahweh <WH3068> shall choose, <WH977> to cause his name <WH8034> to dwell there. <WH7931>

You shall eat <WH398> no leavened bread <WH2557> with it. <WH398> You shall eat unleavened bread <WH4682> with it seven days, <WH4682> even the bread of affliction; <WH6040> for you came forth <WH3318> out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> in haste: <WH2649> that you may remember <WH2142> the day <WH3117> when you came forth <WH3318> out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> all the days <WH3117> of your life. <WH2416>

No yeast shall be <WH7200> seen <WH7200> with you in all your borders <WH1366> seven <WH7651> days; <WH3117> neither shall any of the flesh, <WH1320> which you sacrifice <WH2076> the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> at evening, <WH6153> remain <WH3885> all night until the morning. <WH1242>
You may <WH3201> not sacrifice <WH2076> the Passover <WH6453> within any <WH259> of your gates, <WH8179> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives you; <WH5414>

but at the place <WH4725> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall choose, <WH977> to cause his name <WH8034> to dwell in, <WH2076> there you shall sacrifice the Passover <WH6453> at evening, <WH6153> at the going down <WH935> of the sun, <WH8121> at the season <WH4150> that you came forth <WH3318> out <WH3318> of Egypt. <WH4714>

You shall roast <WH1310> and eat <WH398> it in the place <WH4725> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall choose: <WH977> and you shall turn <WH6437> in the morning, <WH1242> and go <WH1980> to your tents. <WH168>

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> you shall eat <WH398> unleavened bread. <WH4682> On the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> shall be a solemn assembly <WH6116> to Yahweh <WH3068> your God; <WH430> you shall do <WH6213> no work. <WH4399>

You shall count <WH5608> for yourselves seven <WH7651> weeks: <WH7620> from the time you begin <WH2490> to put the sickle <WH2770> to the standing grain <WH7054> you shall begin <WH2490> to number <WH5608> seven <WH7651> weeks. <WH7620>

You shall keep <WH6213> the feast <WH2282> of weeks <WH7620> to Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> with a tribute <WH4530> of a freewill offering <WH5071> of your hand, <WH3027> which you shall give, <WH5414> according as Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> blesses you: <WH1288>

and you shall rejoice <WH8055> before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> you, <WH1121> and your son, and your daughter, <WH1323> and your male servant, <WH5650> and your female servant, <WH519> and the Levite <WH3881> who is within your gates, <WH8179> and the foreigner, <WH1616> and the fatherless, <WH3490> and the widow, <WH490> who are in the midst <WH7130> of you, <WH4725> in the place which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall choose, <WH977> to cause his name <WH8034> to dwell there. <WH7931>
You shall remember <WH2142> that you were a bondservant <WH5650> in Egypt: <WH4714> and you shall observe <WH8104> and do <WH6213> these statutes. <WH2706>
You shall keep <WH6213> the feast <WH2282> of tents <WH5521> seven <WH7651> days, <WH3117> after that you have gathered <WH622> in from your threshing <WH1637> floor and from your winepress: <WH3342>

and you shall rejoice <WH8055> in your feast, <WH2282> you, <WH1121> and your son, and your daughter, <WH1323> and your male servant, <WH5650> and your female servant, <WH519> and the Levite, <WH3881> and the foreigner, <WH1616> and the fatherless, <WH3490> and the widow, <WH490> who are within your gates. <WH8179>

You shall keep a feast <WH2287> to Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> in the place <WH4725> which Yahweh <WH3068> shall choose; <WH977> because Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> will bless <WH1288> you in all your increase, <WH8393> and in all the work <WH4639> of your hands, <WH3027> and you shall be altogether joyful. <WH8056>

Three <WH7969> times <WH6471> in a year <WH8141> shall all your males <WH2138> appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> in the place <WH4725> which he shall choose: <WH977> in the feast <WH2282> of unleavened bread, <WH4682> and in the feast <WH2282> of weeks, <WH7620> and in the feast <WH2282> of tents; <WH5521> and they shall not appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> empty: <WH7387>
every man <WH376> shall give as he is able, <WH4979> according to the blessing <WH1293> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> which he has given you. <WH5414>

You shall make <WH5414> judges <WH8199> and officers <WH7860> in all your gates, <WH8179> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you, <WH7626> according to your tribes; and they shall judge <WH8199> the people <WH5971> with righteous <WH6664> judgment. <WH4941>

You shall not wrest <WH5186> justice: <WH4941> you shall not respect <WH5234> persons; <WH6440> neither shall you take <WH3947> a bribe; <WH7810> for a bribe <WH7810> does blind <WH5786> the eyes <WH5869> of the wise, <WH2450> and pervert <WH5557> the words <WH1697> of the righteous. <WH6662>
You shall follow <WH7291> that which is altogether <WH6664> just, <WH6664> that you may live, <WH2421> and inherit <WH3423> the land <WH776> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives you. <WH5414>

You shall not plant <WH5193> for yourselves an Asherah <WH842> of any kind of tree <WH6086> beside <WH681> the altar <WH4196> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> which you shall make for yourselves. <WH6213>
Neither shall you set yourself up <WH6965> a pillar; <WH4676> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> hates. <WH8130>
